content: spa washcloth designed by kate alvis katyscrochet@yahoo com this spa style washcloth will pamper your skin try stitching it in organic cotton for the ultimate in natural luxury measures a generous 9 square and is great for adults or babies what a wonderful gift wrapped around a bar of handmade soap skill level beginner with knowledge of basic crochet techniques materials worsted weight cotton yarn 1 75 oz size h crochet hook yarn needle terms slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain space space half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet gauge 4 stitches = 1 4 row = 1 depending on your gauge you may want to adjust your hook size up or down measurements approximately 9 square directions with worsted weight yarn and h hook chain 41 row 1 single_crochet in 3rd chain from hook chain 1 skip next chain single_crochet in next chain across turn row 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in 1st chain space chain 1 skip next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next chain space repeat to end turn row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st chain space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain space repeat to end turn repeat row 2 & 3 until washcloth measures approx 9 from start ending with a single_crochet row border chain 1 turn single_crochet in same space as chain chain 2 single_crochet in same corner space single_crochet evenly around edge of washcloth working single_crochet in corner space ch2 single_crochet in same space at each corner join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet finish off finishing using yarn needle weave yarn ends securely into washcloth border use steam iron to block washcloth if necessary original design © 2008 kate alvis please do not redistribute or resell the pattern in any form you may use the pattern to make as many items as you want for personal use as gifts or for charity however you may not sell finished items made from this pattern you also may not use my photos or take credit for the design
